# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2024-01-01

### Changed
- Package name changed from `modern-django-admin` to `behi-admin`

### Added
- Initial release
- Modern UI/UX with responsive design
- RTL/LTR support
- Dark mode support
- Global search functionality
- Dashboard with widgets
- Multi-language support (en, fa, ar, es, it, de)
- Customizable settings
- Full Django Admin compatibility
- Demo project
- Test suite
- CI/CD configuration

### Features
- Sidebar navigation with collapsible menu
- Mobile-responsive design
- Theme customization (colors, logo, favicon)
- Permission-aware global search
- Dashboard widgets
- Recent actions display
- Enhanced change list and change form views
- Accessibility improvements
